smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function draw is nested too deeply.
Function onActivityResult is nested too deeply.
Function onReceive is nested too deeply.
Function deleteImage is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LabeledExpression
smells.description: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

instances.message: Expression with labels increase complexity and affect maintainability.

smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function createOutputStreamLegacy appears to be too complex.
The function saveImageToFile appears to be too complex.
The function notificationSettingsIntent appears to be too complex.
The function onReceive appears to be too complex.
The function deleteImage appears to be too complex.

smells.name: StringLiteralDuplication
smells.description: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

instances.message: Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.
Multiple occurrences of the same string literal within a single file detected.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function createNotification is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: File 'UtilsNotifications.kt' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside files is set to '11'
Class 'TakeScreenshotActivity' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function addImageToGallery has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: TooGenericExceptionCaught
smells.description: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

instances.message: Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.
Caught exception is too generic. Prefer catching specific exceptions to the case that is currently handled.

smells.name: FunctionMaxLength
smells.description: Function names should not be longer than the maximum set in the project configuration.

instances.message: Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.
Function names should be at most 30 characters long.

smells.name: LateinitUsage
smells.description: Usage of lateinit detected. Using lateinit for property initialization is error prone, try using constructor injection or delegation.

instances.message: Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.
Usages of latinit should be avoided.

smells.name: UnsafeCast
smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

instances.message: findPreference(getString(R.string.pref_key_delay)) cannot be safely cast to ListPreference?.
findPreference(getString(R.string.pref_key_file_format)) cannot be safely cast to ListPreference?.
findPreference(getString(name)) cannot be safely cast to Preference?.
findPreference(getString(name)) cannot be safely cast to Preference?.
fragment cannot be safely cast to Fragment.

smells.name: UseDataClass
smells.description: Classes that do nothing but hold data should be replaced with a data class.

instances.message: The class PrefManager defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.
The class CompressionOptions defines nofunctionality and only holds data. Consider converting it to a data class.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of MainActivity.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ScreenshotSelectorView.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of the class or object.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of SettingFragment.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of ScreenshotTileService.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of IntentHandler.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of AcquireScreenshotPermission.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of the class or object.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.description: Restrict the number of return statements in methods.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
java.io.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
com.github.ipcjs.screenshottile.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.os.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (outputStreamResult as? OutputStreamResultSuccess?) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: outputStreamResult as? OutputStreamResultSuccess?

Parentheses in (min(
        max(screenDensity / 2, TakeScreenshotActivity.NOTIFICATION_PREVIEW_MIN_SIZE),
        TakeScreenshotActivity.NOTIFICATION_PREVIEW_MAX_SIZE
    )) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: min(
        max(screenDensity / 2, TakeScreenshotActivity.NOTIFICATION_PREVIEW_MIN_SIZE),
        TakeScreenshotActivity.NOTIFICATION_PREVIEW_MAX_SIZE
    )

smells.name: SerialVersionUIDInSerializableClass
smells.description: A class which implements the Serializable interface does not define a correct serialVersionUID field. The serialVersionUID field should be a constant long value inside a companion object.

instances.message: The class SaveImageResult implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
The class OutputStreamResult implements the Serializable interface and should thus define a serialVersionUID.
